meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Brea Place - Apartments in Brea, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Avalon Brea Place offers studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes for lease. Thoughtfully designed living spaces include modern, open concept kitchens with steel appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art 24/7 fitness center with studio space, rooftop pool and spa and multiple lounge areas. Our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed internet access in each apartment home, powered by AT&T, providing instant internet access for residents upon move-in. Centrally located, Avalon Brea Place is convenient to a variety of recreation and entertainment options, with easy access to the 57 Freeway. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your home office away from home. Second Space Work Suites provides all of the amenities of the office without the hassles of a commute.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

Each studio and 1-bedroom apartment are assigned one parking space. 

Each 2-bedroom apartment is assigned two parking spaces within the parking garage. 

Premium parking is reserved for upgraded apartment homes. Premium parking is defined as guaranteed covered parking either on the same level or near the closest elevator or stairwell. 

Standard apartment homes receive their first assigned parking space covered. 2-bedroom homes receive their first assigned space covered and their second assigned space uncovered on the top level. 

Parking is not on the same level as the apartment home. 

Additional parking options are also available for an additional charge.
